features: Security and Reliability - All of our first aid products carry certificate of conformity to ensure conformance to global standards wherever they are used.

Quality - The box is hard case, compact and easy to carry, holds all the basic first aid supplies (150 pieces total). It is well-organized and there is still additional space to add more items when necessary.

Comprehensive Care - This ultimate survival kit consists of everything that you need to clean and dress minor wounds in a portable first aid box. Our first aid bag will give you the peace of mind that you deserve for small trauma during every adventure at home, school, office, and the outdoors.

Be Your Own Doctor - Make sure you keep your kit close to hand when professional first aid care may be some distance away. Recommended for Car, Home, Office, Kitchen, Road Trips, Camping, Hiking, Travel, Sports and more.
HIGH QUALITY - You need outdoor gear that's as tough as you are, which is why we sell only the highest quality products that are built to last.Providing you with the best in the industry.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Inexpensive, but has almost all the basics (no Ace / compression bandages included for sprains)
reviews.reviewText: For the price and size, this is a good option for an everyday office or light use first aid kit. Includes a face shield and CPR / first aid directions along with items to assist with bangs, scrapes, and cuts.Lots of antiseptic / alcohol wipes, adhesive bandages in a variety of sizes with a few butterflies, two sizes of gauze and tape, a small roller bandage and sling material, tongue depressors, one disposable cool pack, first aid scissors, safety pins, and tweezers, among other things. Also includes a couple of packets of burn ointment and triple antibiotic cream.The plastic case has a ring where you can wire it shut if the plastic buckles break off or if you are storing it standing up in a cabinet. Plastic is thick enough not to crack right away but isn’t overly heavy. The handle can be bent out of the way or has holes so you can mount the whole kit to something, if you wish.I’m not sure how watertight the plastic container is (or will stay), but it does have a gasket inside the cover to help with this.Manufacture date was January 2024 for kit received in early February 2024; expiration May 2026.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good first aid kit to have around
reviews.reviewText: It is a nice kit to have around the house or in the car for a simple first aid. It is a good value because it contains pretty much what you need for minor injuries and the price is right. The web page shows all the items contained. I also included the picture of the back which has the contents listed. I like that it shows expiration date which is useful because things like bandage adhesive goes bad when old. Bandages, by the way, is a regular kind and not the type to keep the water out.Some of the nice things in the kit are good scissors which works well to cut through gauze and clothing. Burn gel, antiseptic, and sting-relief pad will come in handy.The box itself is also good. It has a rubber seal for waterproofing. Its handle has screw holes which can be used for wall mounting. The handle also snaps onto the body for neat packing in a small space. It even has tabs for secure closing and it can be used to tell if it has been opened or not.Overall, I like it and I am glad to have gotten it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: General Medi has the perfect first aid kit for anyone who needs their first kit for your home. I took it all apart and repacked it with the bandaids on top. As that is the most common thing you need to grab out of your kit. I took a picture of a bandaid in use. They are waterproof and slightly flexible, secure and long lasting. They even provided a quick saver mouth to mouth resuscitation device with clear and concise directions how to perform this life saving task. This is a really nice kit at an affordable price. This would make a great gift for anyone in your circle of friends and family. I absolutely recommend it 👌.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars First Aid Kit
reviews.reviewText: This is a nice, slightly upgraded first aid kit. It has the expected items such as bandages, gloves, and rubbing alcohol, but it also includes items such as a CPR mask and an emergency foil blanket. It is compact, the items are separated inside for ease of use, and it does have a bit of extra room for including additional items. The items in my kit such as alcohol wipes and ointment are labeled with manufacture and expiration dates. All items appear to have been manufactured less than a year ago and have expiration dates more than a year in the future. This would be a great basic kit to keep in your car for emergencies.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Contains Most Of What You Need, Inexpensive
reviews.reviewText: This is a good, basic, inexpensive first aid kit. It includes most of the medical supplies you need in a first aid kit, but lacks the bells and whistles of more expensive kits. It is housed in a plastic box that seals sufficiently to keep out moisture. It also includes some cheap scissors, tweezers, gloves, masks, finger splints and safety pins, to make temporary treatments intended to last no longer than the time required to seek professional medical attention. In short, this is a kit intended for short term treatment only, and is adequate for that purpose.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great first Aid kit!
reviews.reviewText: This is a great first aid kit with a log of differently items. It has gauze, different bandages, ice packs that work with a chemical reaction. It's always good to have these supplies available.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Basic First aid supplies
reviews.reviewText: This is a really good first aid kit with all the basics for those emergency situations or just a scape or cut. Great to keep in your car, take camping or just have in your home. I like the selection of bandages, ointments and extras.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Nice first aid kit. It contains just about anything you might need for a minor scrape/bruise/cut type emergency. I love all the different types and sizes of bandages it has. And I like that it has both cleaning wipes and antiseptic as well as triple antibiotic ointment for cleaning, sterilizing, and then protecting a wound. This will be in my car and on every trip I go on from now on.
